description: This file defines a React component named ConnectorCard that displays information about a connector (such as Jira or Confluence), including its connection status, and provides buttons to connect or disconnect the connector. It manages connection state, handles disconnection via an API call, and displays relevant status messages and errors.

methods.name: ConnectorCard
methods.description: React functional component that displays connector information, manages connection status, and handles user interactions for connecting/disconnecting.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Asynchronous function that calls the disconnectConnector API, updates connection state, handles errors, and manages loading state.
